Legal_Issue: Existence of an internal flight alternative (IFA) in Venezuela
Legal_Provision: Section 97 or 98 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Evaluation_Standard: Serious possibility of persecution and unreasonable conditions in IFA
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Identification of Caracas and Valencia as safe areas
Regulation_Cited: IRPR Section 101 or related provisions on IFA
Application_Error: Applicant failed to prove risk of persecution or unreasonable conditions in IFA
Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the Board erred in finding an IFA existed
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Internal Flight Alternative doctrine under refugee law
Cause_of_Refusal: Existence of a viable internal flight alternative in Venezuela
Evidentiary_Issues: Insufficient evidence of persecution risk in proposed IFA
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of Boardâ€™s IFA determination
Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, IRPA Regulations
Procedural_Issue: Standard of review on judicial review
